entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
